messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] oda nobunaga -- to tony
messages.msgSnippet: Just wondering... Is there enough info on Oda to do a book on how to use some of his methods (albeit modified to suit the situation) in the business world?  As
messages.messageBody:
Just wondering...
Is there enough info on Oda to do a book on how to use some of his
methods (albeit modified to suit the situation) in the business world? As I
said, just wondering. That alt-history novel question I asked a couple months ago
was a much more serious question. (I have it in my spiral-bound of story
ideas, and do plan to someday write it.)

L8r
Tim
